section.title: Tingen_development.InheritOnlyReturns Class Reference

para.para: This class shows hows you can "inherit" the doc comments from one method in another method.

listitem.para: In this example, this summary is only visible for this method.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: This class shows hows you can "inherit" the doc comments from one method in another method.
You can inherit all comments, or only a specific tag, represented by an xpath expression.
